featured.text: The organization encourages consumers to choose brands that take precautions to protect elephants and has set up a certification program to reward tea growers who are doing it right.

other.text: The organization believes that people may be motivated to buy elephant-friendly brands when they know more about the risk tea can pose to these endangered animals.

definition.zh_def: 品牌：一個公司或產品的名稱、標誌或設計，用於區別其商品或服務。
definition.en_def: A brand is a name, term, design, symbol, or other feature that distinguishes one seller's product from those of others.
definition.example: Apple is a well-known brand in the technology industry.
